project.name: Atlas Mobile
project.scope: Cross-platform app, feature flags, offline sync

sections.title: Project Overview & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish understanding of Atlas Mobile's goals, pilot scope, and the UX Lead's responsibilities.
sample_questions: Can you summarize the core objectives of the Atlas Mobile pilot from a UX perspective?
What are your primary responsibilities as the UX Lead on this project?
How does the pilot phase influence your design and research approach?

sections.title: Design System & Accessibility
sections.goal: Explore the DS-ATLAS v2 tokenized components and accessibility considerations.
sample_questions: How did the DS-ATLAS v2 tokenized components influence the cross-platform design?
What accessibility standards are you targeting and how are they validated?
Can you describe any challenges in aligning design tokens with offline sync features?

sections.title: Feature Flags & Experimentation
sections.goal: Understand how UX is impacted by feature flag strategy and experimentation.
sample_questions: How do you ensure consistent UX when features are toggled on/off via flags?
What collaboration exists between UX and engineering to manage user experience in A/B tests?
Have you encountered any conflicts between rapid experimentation and design consistency?

sections.title: Cross-Department Collaboration
sections.goal: Identify how UX works with SRE, QA, and Platform teams to meet SLAs and policies.
sample_questions: How do you integrate feedback from QA's risk-based testing into UX iterations?
Can you give an example where SRE input changed a design decision?
How do policies like POL-SEC-001 influence UX workflows?

sections.title: Incident Response & UX
sections.goal: Link UX decisions to operational runbooks such as RB-MOB-021 Crash Loop Mitigation.
sample_questions: How are UX considerations included in incident response for mobile crashes?
Have you had to adjust designs due to operational constraints from runbooks?
Can you walk through a case where a crash loop impacted user trust and how you responded?

sections.title: Long-term Sustainability & Risks
sections.goal: Discuss tradeoffs, risks, and evidence-based decisions for scaling beyond pilot.
sample_questions: What are the key UX risks if Atlas Mobile scales rapidly?
How do you balance speed of delivery with maintaining accessibility standards?
Can you share evidence or metrics that informed a major design tradeoff?
